nodeInfos.desc: The door is locked by a passcode, next to the door is some cryptic text. Maybe I will find some hints in the room of what to do with it
nodeInfos.title: INPUT

nodeInfos.desc: This photo look familiar, I wonder if he would have know what to do
nodeInfos.title: An old Friend

nodeInfos.desc: You fell asleep on Friday while studying for an exam at the university. When you wake up on Saturday morning, you realize your "luck." It quickly becomes clear that you want to get out of there, but the university has locked doors and other security measures. And so, your masterful escape begins.
nodeInfos.title: Where am I
